derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from legal French burglarie, from burgler (see burglar)

entry.def: If someone commits a burglary, they enter a building by force and steal things. Burglary is the act of doing this.

example.tran: 一个11岁的小男孩犯了入室盗窃罪。

means.word_mean: 1. entering a building unlawfully with intent to commit a felony or to steal valuable property

sentences.en: I don’t buy the burglary story.
sentences.cn: 我可不相信这种夜间遭到撬窃的说法。

sentences.en: She told the police that Jim was with her when the burglary happened, so that put him in the clear.
sentences.cn: 她告诉警方行窃案发生时吉姆与她在一起,以证明吉姆的清白。
